steps: Case listed by court or referred by parties
Conciliatory discussion facilitated by judicial members
Award signed by Lok Adalat judge & secretary
Award is final, binding & enforceable as decree

timeline.closure: Typically resolved within a single session (same day or few days)

jurisdiction.scope: Disposed with adjudicatory and conciliatory powers

special_provisions.no_appeal: No appeal; revival via writ petition only

important_notes: Binding and final nature saves time & cost
Ideal for simple and amicable disputes
